ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will say, 'Are you looking down?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He will say: -- Do you wish to know where he is now?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do you want to see him?' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said (to others on the thrones), “Will you take a glimpse (into hell) below?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall say: Will you look on?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then he will say, "Shall we look for him?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah will say: will ye look down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will say, ‘Will you have a look?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (A voice) said: "Would ye like to look down?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And he will reply: 'Are you looking down (into Hell)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will say, “Will you have a look?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:54] He, the one speaking, says, to his brethren [in Paradise], ‘Will you have a look?’, together with me into the Fire, to see his condition — but they will say, ‘No’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He saith) to his brothers in Paradise: (Will ye look) in the Fire that haply you may find out about his state?
